title: How to Make Ginger Syrup

steps.headline: Make a simple syrup: Mix 1 cup sugar and 1 cup water in a saucepan.
steps.description: Bring it to a boil. Simmer gently until the sugar dissolves. Stir occasionally.

steps.headline: Add 1/2 cup of thinly sliced fresh ginger.
Remove from heat; let cool, then add 2 Tablespoons of lemon juice.
Pour into a container through sieve.

text: Make a simple syrup: Mix 1 cup sugar and 1 cup water in a saucepan. Bring it to a boil. Simmer gently until the sugar dissolves. Stir occasionally. Add 1/2 cup of thinly sliced fresh ginger. Simmer for 15 minutes. Remove from heat; let cool, then add 2 Tablespoons of lemon juice.  Pour into a container through sieve.  Refrigerate until ready to use.
